text: Khawaja Muhammad Asif is a Pakistani Politician who is current Defence Minister of Pakistan, in office 11 March 2024. Having Previously this post from 2022 to 2023. He is also Member of the Pakistani Parliament since 1993.A leader infamous for his controversial statements, in 2025, he openly admitted to Pakistan's past and present of supporting, sheltering and financing terrorism. == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani politicians
title: Khawaja Asif
